function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overcrowded living conditions leading to increased risk of contagious disease spread","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission and reduced overall health","Mitigation":"Improve housing conditions, provide adequate space for isolation, and implement measures to reduce overcrowding","Technologies":"Smart home technology for remote work and monitoring, ventilation systems, and occupancy sensors","People":"Resident population, immigrant population","Owner":"Government, housing developers, and building management"},{"Description":"Damp and degraded housing conditions leading to health problems","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory issues, mold-related illnesses, and overall reduced health","Mitigation":"Repair structural issues, improve ventilation and address damp problems","Technologies":"Building materials for moisture control, ventilation systems, and mold detection technology","People":"Resident population, immigrant population","Owner":"Government, housing developers, and building management"},{"Description":"Inadequate living space hindering physical distancing and well-being","Impact":"Limited ability to maintain physical distance, increased discomfort, and potential danger","Mitigation":"Design and plan for adequate space, promote well-being through spatial arrangements, and implement remote work solutions","Technologies":"Smart home technology for remote work and monitoring, space optimization tools, and virtual collaboration platforms","People":"Resident population, immigrant population","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, and housing developers"}]}
